data.title: Malay and Iban Languages
data.meta_description: Malay and Iban Languages - Free download as Powerpoint Presentation (.ppt), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or view presentation slides online. The document summarizes some key aspects of the Malay and Iban languages. It discusses the history and origins of the Malay language in Malaysia and how it became the national language. It also addresses current issues with the Malay language including its use in science and math education and the influence of Manglish. The future of the Malay language is uncertain but it may become a pidgin language. The passage also provides an overview of the Iban language spoken in Borneo, including its dialects, alphabet, pronunciation and similarities to Malay grammar.
